verses.verse: Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5011>Nob<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> and <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> <S%H2729>came<s%> <S%H2729>trembling<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4069>"Why<s%> are you <S%H905>alone<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with you?"

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> "The <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H6680>commissioned<s%> me with a <S%H1697>matter,<s%> and has <S%H559>said<s%> to me, 'Let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3972>anything<s%> about the <S%H1697>matter<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H7971>sending<s%> you and with <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6680>commissioned<s%> you; and I have <S%H3045>directed<s%> the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>men<s%> to a <S%H492>certain<s%> <S%H6423><s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>'

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H4100>what<s%> do you <S%H3426>have<s%> on <S%H3027>hand<s%>? <S%H5414>Give<s%> me <S%H2568>five<s%> loaves of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> whatever can be <S%H4672>found.<s%>"

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H369>"There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2455>ordinary<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> on <S%H3027>hand,<s%> but <S%H3426>there<s%> is <S%H6944>consecrated<s%> <S%H3899>bread;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>men<s%> have <S%H8104>kept<s%> themselves from <S%H802>women.<s%>"

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3588>"Surely<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H802>women<s%> have been <S%H6113>kept<s%> from us as <S%H8543>previously<s%> <S%H8032><s%> when I <S%H3318>set<s%> out and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>men<s%> were <S%H6944>holy,<s%> though it was an <S%H2455>ordinary<s%> <S%H1870>journey;<s%> <S%H637>how<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H637>more<s%> <S%H3588><s%> then <S%H3117>today<s%> will their <S%H3627>vessels<s%> [be holy]?"

So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H6944>consecrated<s%> <S%H3899>[bread<s%>]; for there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> but the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H6440>Presence<s%> which was <S%H5493>removed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in order to <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H2527>hot<s%> bread [in its place] <S%H3117>when<s%> it was <S%H3947>taken<s%> away.

Now <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H8033>there<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H6113>detained<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1673>Doeg<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite,<s%> the <S%H47>chief<s%> of Saul's <S%H7462>shepherds.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech,<s%> "Now is <S%H3426>there<s%> not a <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> on <S%H3027>hand<s%>? For I <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H3808><s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> my <S%H3627>weapons<s%> with me, <S%H3588>because<s%> the king's <S%H1697>matter<s%> was <S%H5169>urgent.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H5221>killed<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H424>Elah,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H3874>wrapped<s%> in a <S%H8071>cloth<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H646>ephod;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you would <S%H3947>take<s%> it for yourself, <S%H3947>take<s%> [it.] For <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H2108>except<s%> it <S%H2088>here.<s%>" And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H369>"There<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> it; <S%H5414>give<s%> it to me."
Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1272>fled<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>

But the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Is <S%H2088>this<s%> not <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>? Did they not <S%H9420>sing<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> as they <S%H4246>danced,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7586>'Saul<s%> has <S%H5221>slain<s%> his <S%H505>thousands,<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousands<s%>'?"

So he <S%H8132>disguised<s%> his <S%H2940>sanity<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> them, and <S%H1984>acted<s%> <S%H1984>insanely<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H8427>scribbled<s%> on the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and let his <S%H9554>saliva<s%> <S%H3381>run<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into his <S%H2206>beard.<s%>

Then <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7696>behaving<s%> as a <S%H7696>madman.<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> do you <S%H935>bring<s%> him to me?

"Do I <S%H2638>lack<s%> <S%H7696>madmen,<s%> that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> to <S%H7696>act<s%> the <S%H7696>madman<s%> in my <S%H5921>presence<s%>? Shall <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into my <S%H1004>house<s%>?"
